Package org.streamexperiments.producer.integration.tcp

Class TcpProducerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streamexperiments.producer.integration.tcp.TcpProducerConfiguration
  • @Configuration
@ConditionalOnProperty(value="tcp.enabled",
                       havingValue="true")
public class TcpProducerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Gathers the integration stuff related to Kafka messaging, conditionally loaded depending on tcp.enabled property. If that property is set to "true" the configuration will be loaded, otherwise it will not. Notice the integration stuff is abstracted behind Gateway to which an extension is provided here with TcpProducerConfiguration.Gateway

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  TcpProducerConfiguration.Gateway
      Extension of Gatewayr related to TCP messaging.
